ps2.10:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ps2.10:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ps2.10:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
ps2.10:5.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ‘suñño loko’ti vuccatī”ti?
ps2.10:5.3: “Yasmā kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, tasmā ‘suñño loko’ti vuccati.
ps2.10:5.4: Kiñcānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā?
ps2.10:5.5: Cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:5.6: Rūpā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:5.7: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:5.8: Cakkhusamphasso suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:5.9: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.10: mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.11: Dhammā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.12: Manoviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.13: Manosamphasso suñño attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.14: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
ps2.10:6.15: Yasmā kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā tasmā ‘suñño loko’ti vuccatī”ti.
ps2.10:8.1: Suññasuññaṃ, saṅkhārasuññaṃ, vipariṇāmasuññaṃ, aggasuññaṃ, lakkhaṇasuññaṃ, vikkhambhanasuññaṃ, tadaṅgasuññaṃ, samucchedasuññaṃ, paṭippassaddhisuññaṃ, nissaraṇasuññaṃ, ajjhattasuññaṃ, bahiddhāsuññaṃ, dubhatosuññaṃ, sabhāgasuññaṃ, visabhāgasuññaṃ, esanāsuññaṃ, pariggahasuññaṃ, paṭilābhasuññaṃ, paṭivedhasuññaṃ, ekattasuññaṃ, nānattasuññaṃ, khantisuññaṃ, adhiṭṭhānasuññaṃ, pariyogāhaṇasuññaṃ, sampajānassa pavattapariyādānaṃ sabbasuññatānaṃ paramatthasuññaṃ. #25/25
ps2.10:10.2: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:10.8: mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:11.4: Puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhārena ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:11.5: Apuññābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhārena ca āneñjābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:11.6: Āneñjābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhārena ca apuññābhisaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:12.3: Kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhārena ca cittasaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:12.4: Vacīsaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhārena ca cittasaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:12.5: Cittasaṅkhāro kāyasaṅkhārena ca vacīsaṅkhārena ca suñño.
ps2.10:13.2: atītā saṅkhārā, anāgatā saṅkhārā, paccuppannā saṅkhārā.
ps2.10:13.3: Atītā saṅkhārā anāgatehi ca paccuppannehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā.
ps2.10:13.4: Anāgatā saṅkhārā atītehi ca paccuppannehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā paccuppannā saṅkhārā atītehi ca anāgatehi ca saṅkhārehi suññā.
ps2.10:14.5: Vigatā vedanā vipariṇatā ceva suññā ca … pe …
ps2.10:14.13: Vigato bhavo vipariṇato ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:15.2: Aggametaṃ padaṃ seṭṭhametaṃ padaṃ visiṭṭhametaṃ padaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
ps2.10:16.8: Uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:16.9: Vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ, ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.1: Rūpassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.2: Rūpassa vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.3: Rūpassa ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.10: jarāmaraṇassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ vayalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.11: Jarāmaraṇassa vayalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:17.12: Jarāmaraṇassa ṭhitaññathattalakkhaṇaṃ uppādalakkhaṇena ca vayalakkhaṇena ca suññaṃ.
ps2.10:18.2: Nekkhammena kāmacchando vikkhambhito ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:18.3: Abyāpādena byāpādo vikkhambhito ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:18.6: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:18.7: Ñāṇena avijjā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:18.8: Pāmojjena arati vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:18.9: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca … pe …
ps2.10:18.11: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā vikkhambhitā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:20.2: Nekkhammena kāmacchando samucchinno ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:20.3: Abyāpādena byāpādo samucchinno ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:20.6: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:20.7: Ñāṇena avijjā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:20.8: Pāmojjena arati samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:20.9: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca … pe …
ps2.10:20.11: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā samucchinnā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:21.2: Nekkhammena kāmacchando paṭippassaddho ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:21.3: Abyāpādena byāpādo paṭippassaddho ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:21.6: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:21.7: Ñāṇena avijjā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:21.8: Pāmojjena arati paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:21.9: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca … pe …
ps2.10:21.11: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā paṭippassaddhā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:22.2: Nekkhammena kāmacchando nissaṭo ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:22.3: Abyāpādena byāpādo nissaṭo ceva suñño ca.
ps2.10:22.6: Dhammavavatthānena vicikicchā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:22.7: Ñāṇena avijjā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:22.8: Pāmojjena arati nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:22.9: Paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca … pe …
ps2.10:22.11: arahattamaggena sabbakilesā nissaṭā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:23.2: Ajjhattaṃ cakkhuṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:23.7: ajjhattaṃ mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:24.4: bahiddhā dhammā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:25.2: Yañca ajjhattaṃ cakkhu ye ca bahiddhā rūpā ubhayametaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:25.3: Yañca ajjhattaṃ sotaṃ ye ca bahiddhā saddā … pe …
ps2.10:25.5: yañca ajjhattaṃ ghānaṃ ye ca bahiddhā gandhā …
ps2.10:25.6: yā ca ajjhattaṃ jivhā ye ca bahiddhā rasā …
ps2.10:25.7: yo ca ajjhattaṃ kāyo ye ca bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbā …
ps2.10:25.8: yo ca ajjhattaṃ mano ye ca bahiddhā dhammā ubhayametaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
ps2.10:26.2: Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni sabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.
ps2.10:26.3: Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni sabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.
ps2.10:26.4: Cha viññāṇakāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:26.5: Cha phassakāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:26.6: Cha vedanākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:26.7: Cha saññākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:26.8: Cha cetanākāyā sabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:27.2: Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni chahi bāhirehi āyatanehi visabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.
ps2.10:27.3: Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni chahi viññāṇakāyehi visabhāgāni ceva suññāni ca.
ps2.10:27.4: Cha viññāṇakāyā chahi phassakāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:27.5: Cha phassakāyā chahi vedanākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:27.6: Cha vedanākāyā chahi saññākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:27.7: Cha saññākāyā chahi cetanākāyehi visabhāgā ceva suññā ca.
ps2.10:36.2: Idha sampajāno nekkhammena kāmacchandassa pavattaṃ pariyādiyati
ps2.10:36.9: paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ pavattaṃ pariyādiyati … pe …
ps2.10:36.11: Atha vā pana sampajānassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa idaṃ ceva cakkhupavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca cakkhupavattaṃ na uppajjati.
ps2.10:36.16: manopavattaṃ pariyādiyati, aññañca manopavattaṃ na uppajjati.
ps2.10:41.1: Esa nikāyadharehi ṭhapito, asamo dutiyo pavaro varavaggoti.
